Description.Text:
Ideally located on Edinburgh's Royal Mile and the Old Town, these luxury, 4 star apartments feature stylish interiors with spacious lounge areas. Edinburgh Castle is less than a 10 minute-walk. Each of the relaxing lounge areas at St Giles Apartments is individually furnished and includes a large TV with DVD player and a modern coffee table. Some of the apartments include city views, hanging artwork or comfortable leather sofas and rugs. All of the sleek and modern designer kitchens are fully equipped with units including a stove top, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine and dryer. Full kitchen cutlery and dishes are provided, and each open plan kitchen features a dining area with chairs. Edinburgh Waverley Train Station and the lovely Princes Gardens are just a short walk away.
Please note that you need to come to our office at 1 Byres Close, 375 High Street, just beside the retail shop Marchbrae, to check in and collect the keys to your apartment. If you are arriving after 8 pm, please contact us for late Check-in instructions. PLEASE CHECK THE APARTMENTS DESCRIPTIONS FOR THE EXACT ADDRESS OF EACH APARTMENT.

Our apartments are located throughout Edinburgh's Old Town. To check in to your apartment please come to our office, located beside retail shop Marchbrae at 375 High Street,where you will be given keys and directions to your apartment. Our office is located only 600m from Waverley rail station and Princes Street.

ALL APARTMENTS - Each of these city centre apartments have been designed, furnished and equipped to an excellent standard to ensure you have a very comfortable and enjoyable stay. TV and DVD player provided. High quality linens and towels are provided. Bathroom toliteries are provided. Free parking is available at select locations. Free Wifi is available at select locations. High chairs and baby cots are available upon request. Welcome pack including coffee, tea, sugar, juice and water upon arrival. Late check out available at cost of 10 GBP per hour, maximum of 2 hours.
OLD FISHMARKET CLOSE TWO BEDROOM - This lovely apartment is situated down historic Old Fishmarket Close, up the Royal Mile and near St Giles Cathedral. Recently refurbished, the apartment is located in a modern development with a lift. It has been designed, furnished and equipped to a very high standard. It contains two double bedrooms, a fully equipped, modern kitchen, bathroom and a living room with dining area. NO WIFI available. A Welcome Pack is offered.
ST GILES ONE BEDROOM - Recently upgraded, this City Centre first floor apartment has been designed, furnished and equipped to a very high standard to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The apartment is situated in the heart of Edinburgh's Royal Mile and commands stunning views of St.Giles Cathedral and Parliament House. It contains a spacious double bedroom and an open plan living room/kitchen. Free Wifi is available and a Welcoming Pack is offered.
ST GILES TWO BEDROOM - St Giles Two Bedroom Apartment. Recently refurbished, this city centre first floor apartment has been designed, furnished and equipped to a very high standard to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The apartment is beautifully situated in the heart of Edinburgh's Royal Mile and commands stunning views of St Giles Cathedral and Parliament House. It contains 2 double bedrooms, one with an en suite bathroom and a large open plan lounge, kitchen with dining area. Free Wifi is available in this apartment.
ST GILES THREE BEDROOM - Recently upgraded, those apartments are situated in the heart of Edinburgh's Royal Mile and commands stunning views of St.Giles Cathedral and Parliament House. Each contains three spacious double bedrooms -one with an en-suite bathroom- a fully equipped kitchen and lounge with dining area. Free Wifi is available and a Welcome Pack is offered.
